figma.name: figma

storybook.name: storybook

testing-library.name: testing-library

cypress.name: cypress

msw.name: msw

backend.title: backend

nodejs.name: nodejs

java.name: java
java.description: Object-oriented language for enterprise systems. Used in corporate applications, Spring Boot microservices, and systems requiring performance.

nestjs.name: nestjs
nestjs.description: Progressive Node.js framework inspired by Angular. Modular architecture with dependency injection and TypeScript decorators. Ideal for scalable APIs.

express.name: express

prisma.name: prisma

rest-api.name: rest-api

jwt.name: jwt

oauth2.name: oauth2

swagger.name: swagger

android.name: android

jest.description: Unit and integration testing for React Native. Native module mocking, component snapshot testing, and business logic/hooks testing.

micro-frontends.name: micro-frontends

module-federation.name: module-federation

monorepo.name: monorepo

design-patterns.name: design-patterns

github-actions.name: github-actions

kubernetes.name: kubernetes
